answers.answer: I've only had 4. But at my doctors office they only usually do 2 unless something is wrong. I went to this place to get a 3D/4D ultrasound and paid for it out of pocket.

They usually do only 2 or 3 unless you have some kind of complication... my last pregnancy I had 4 (an extra one because I switched doctors).... this pregnancy I've had a bunch--- too many to count--- they were doing monthly ultrasounds because I had high blood pressure and they thought baby would be growth restricted since she was measuring smaller than normal and that is common with woman with high blood pressure.... then I went off that medicine and got diagnosed with gestational diabetes at 29 weeks... joy! So now they are doing growth scans to make sure she doesnt get too big... its been a roller coaster with this pregnancy.  I have ultrasounds every 2 weeks until 36 weeks and then it will change to twice a week until she is here. .. I'm 33 weeks and quite frankly I am SICK of going to the doctor
Ive had four also and Im getting the 30 week one done towards the end. As long as you dont jave it done too often your ok unless the doctor says they have to watch the baby for health reasons
My doctor gives you one absolutely every time you go in. So I'll have like 10 or so by the time I'm done. And not for any medical reason they do it for everyone there. Its awesome.

question: How many ultrasounds are we suppose to get? I had two so far..
title: ultrasounds
